about_the_game:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Dreamy Planet, including:

  • One uncensored sex scene
  • Two new CGs
  • About 3,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Dreamy Planet, to download.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC uncensors several bathing CGs used throughout the story, and adds one uncensored lesbian sex scene which takes place between two consenting adult characters explicitly said to be in their late 20s.

detailed_description:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Dreamy Planet, including:

  • One uncensored sex scene
  • Two new CGs
  • About 3,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Dreamy Planet, to download.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

name: Dreamy Planet Adult Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: Patch that adds r18 content to Dreamy Planet.
